name: Yang (Yet another ninja game)
description:
Challenge a friend in an epic fast paced two-player battle between ninjas, where every character brings his own set of unique abilities.

Featuring 10 characters with 4 unique abilities each and 5 different maps and various powerups, fun is guaranteed!

You can play on keyboard or with your XBox Controller. This is not a multiplayer game, you play on the same PC.
